page.title: 09VILLAGE LIFE-ATTITUDES-LIKES
page.content: In a{SURVEY,}responses were collected from a{SAMPLE}of the{POPULATION}resid- ing in the{NEIGHBOURHOOD}(from under{1 year to{60+}).{PREDOMINANT}were a num- ber of people living in the{REGION}for {15 YEARS}and less.The area tends to be very much a village for{YOUNG FAMILIES as{EVIDENCED}by changing rolls at sch- ool and the number of houses appearing on{ESTATE AGENTS ADVERTISEMENTS.}From the responses{(24%)}indicated that the {FRIENDLY COMMUNITY ATMOSPHERE}made the village a very satisfactory place to live whilst some{(31%)}stated that the pleasant{RURAL ENVIRONMENT}and{VILLAGE {CHARACTERISTICS}was an ideal choice to 'bring children up in'. Many residents {-(45%)-}were also in agreement on the {ADEQUATE}number of{AMENITIES}available in comparison to the size of the vill- age as well as the general{ACCESSIBIL- {ITY}with other{TOWNS}and the{COAST.
